text:
AdQuick | Santa Monica, CA | Full-Stack Engineer (Rails) | Full-time | ONSITE

We're a pre-seed startup, building a marketplace for outdoor advertising (think billboards, bus shelters, etc). We count H&R Block, Lyft, Instacart as early customers.

Read more about our business here:

https://medium.com/@fahimferdous/happy-new-year-ca7a476d4f83...

Shoot me an email if you're interested in learning more! fahim@adquick.com
